QuestData.Title: Stocking Up on Supplies
QuestData.Description:
Quartermaster Richter was able to scavenge supplies from the wreckages on this island.
Why don't you visit her and see if she has anything that you need?
You'll want to be well equipped for whatever we encounter next.
QuestData.LogDescription: Purchase any item from Quartermaster Richter and sell any of your items to her.
QuestData.RewardText:
All stocked up? That's great.
Private Cole and Quartermaster Richter also found this bag in the nearby ruins. They thought you might make good use of it.

Objectives.Objective: Any item purchased from Quartermaster Richter
Any item sold to Quartermaster Richter
